entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
